ItemConsumable.name: staid
ItemConsumable.description: A pharmacological product, 'by accountants for accountants' if the bottle is to be believed. Dampens lust and reinforcing will. +6 willpower, -6 seduction.

effectstatus.applyText: tastes like a dusty book, blech.

statusAttribMod.removeText: You can feel your sex drive recover.
